snippet: Has a loss of intestinal bacteria caused our immune systems to go haywire? Moises Velasquez-Manoff lays out the hygiene hypothesis.
abstract: Dr Abigail Zuger reviews book An Epidemic of Absence: A New Way of Understanding Allergies and Autoimmune Diseases by Moises Velasquez-Manoff.
lead_paragraph: Has a loss of intestinal bacteria caused our immune systems to go haywire? Moises Velasquez-Manoff lays out the hygiene hypothesis.
